text: Geukheun hai kawom pakri tapike Meunyo na dali Neubri le Allah Tuhanlon Neubri raseuki keu lon Ek patot di lon tulak peurintah Ken napsu di lon bek sa ngon gata Nyang lon tham gata lon pubuet bagah Kon meukeusud lon meulengkan keu got Ube ek lon that napsu bek salah Teuma lon harap taufik bak Tuhan Tawakai di lon keudeh bak Allah Di lon cit lonwoe teuma bak Tuhan
